name: Tartarith
relicBonuses: At the start of battle, the bearer gains {CONDNAME_BUFF_MEND}.
The bearer takes 25% less damage from attacks.
The bearer {ACTION_defends} at the end of its turn.
At the start of each enemy's turn, this relic has a 10% chance to {ACTION_cast} [icons,1976]Soothing Breeze."
After the bearer takes damage, this relic increases its Maximum {STAT_health} by 5%.
The bearer takes 25% less damage from spells.
The bearer deals additional damage equal to 20% of the healing it has received in the current battle.
At the start of the bearer's turn, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1972]Zephyr.
The bearer takes 25% less damage from all sources.
After the bearer takes damage, this relic deals damage to the enemy equal to 50% of the damage dealt.
title: God of Punishment
